snippet: President Obama has pressed the Burmese leader on the pace of constitutional reforms and on the treatment of religious minorities.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Pres Obama presses Myanmar Pres Thein Sein on pace of constitutional reforms and on treatment of Muslims in remote areas where thousands remain in internment camps; plans to visit country to attend two Asian regional summits.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has pressed the Burmese leader on the pace of constitutional reforms and on the treatment of religious minorities.

headline.main: On Visit, Obama to Face a Backsliding Myanmar
headline.print_headline: On Visit, Obama to Face a Backsliding Myanmar

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
